title: Tutorials
description: Here are tutorials on how to use Automatarium

items.title: FSA Tutorial
items.blurb: In this tutorial we will do a walkthrough on how to create a Finite State Automaton in Automatarium.

items.title: PDA Tutorial
items.blurb: In this tutorial we will do a walkthrough on how to create a Pushdown Automaton in Automatarium.

items.title: TM Tutorial
items.blurb: In this tutorial we will do a walkthrough on how to create a Turing Machine in Automatarium.
